    • 方法详细资料

      • getVersion

        int getVersion()
        throws android.os.RemoteException
        Get the current API version
        返回:
        version number. 1000 x major version + minor version Each major version must be compatible with all versions of the same major version
        抛出:
        android.os.RemoteException

      • sipStart

        void sipStart()
       throws android.os.RemoteException
        Start the sip stack
        抛出:
        android.os.RemoteException

      • sipStop

        void sipStop()
      throws android.os.RemoteException
        Stop the sip stack
        抛出:
        android.os.RemoteException

             throws android.os.RemoteException

      • removeAllAccounts

        void removeAllAccounts()
                throws android.os.RemoteException
        Remove all accounts from running sip stack (this does nothing in database)
        抛出:
        android.os.RemoteException

      • reAddAllAccounts

        void reAddAllAccounts()
               throws android.os.RemoteException
        remove and add all accounts available in database and marked active
        抛出:
        android.os.RemoteException

      • setAccountRegistration

        void setAccountRegistration(int accountId,
                            int renew)
                     throws android.os.RemoteException
        Change registration for a given account/profile id (id in database)
        参数:
        accountId - the account for which we'd like to change the registration state
        renew - 0 if we don't want to unregister, 1 to renew registration
        抛出:
        android.os.RemoteException

      • getSipProfileState

        SipProfileState getSipProfileState()
                            throws android.os.RemoteException
        Get registration state for a given account id
        参数:
        accountId - the account/profile id for which we'd like to get the info (in database)
        返回:
        the Profile state
        抛出:
        android.os.RemoteException

      • ignoreNextOutgoingCallFor

                        throws android.os.RemoteException
        Ignore next outgoing call request from tel handler processing
        抛出:
        android.os.RemoteException

      • makeCall

        void makeCall(java.lang.String callee)
       throws android.os.RemoteException
        Place a call.
        参数:
        callee - The sip uri to call. It can also be a simple number, in which case the app will autocomplete. If you add the scheme, take care to fill completely else it could be considered as a call to a sip IP/domain
        accountId - The id of the account to use for this call.
        抛出:
        android.os.RemoteException

      • makeCallWithOptions

        void makeCallWithOptions(java.lang.String callee)
                  throws android.os.RemoteException
        Place a call.
        参数:
        callee - The sip uri to call. It can also be a simple number, in which case the app will autocomplete. If you add the scheme, take care to fill completely else it could be considered as a call to a sip IP/domain
        accountId - The id of the account to use for this call.
        options - The options you'd like to apply for this calls SipCallSession.OPT_CALL_VIDEO, SipCallSession.OPT_CALL_EXTRA_HEADERS
        抛出:
        android.os.RemoteException

      • answer

        int answer(int callId,
           int status)
    throws android.os.RemoteException
        Answer a call.
        参数:
        callId - The id of the call to answer.
        status - The sip status code you'd like to answer with. 200 to take the call. 400 <= status < 500 if refusing.
        抛出:
        android.os.RemoteException

      • hangup

        int hangup(int callId,
           int status)
    throws android.os.RemoteException
        Hangup a call.
        参数:
        callId - The id of the call to hangup.
        status - The sip status code you'd like to hangup with.
        抛出:
        android.os.RemoteException

      • confGetRxTxLevel

        long confGetRxTxLevel(int port)
               throws android.os.RemoteException
        Get Rx and Tx sound level for a given port.
        参数:
        port - Port id we'd like to have the level
        返回:
        The RX and TX (0-255) level encoded as RX << 8 | TX
        抛出:
        android.os.RemoteException

      • startRecording

        void startRecording(int callId,
                    int way)
             throws android.os.RemoteException
        Start recording of a call to a file.
        参数:
        callId - the call id to start recording of.
        way - the way the recording takes SipManager.BITMASK_IN => record remote party (what goes out speaker/earpiece) SipManager.BITMASK_OUT => record self (what comes from micro), If 0 will record all ways.
        抛出:
        android.os.RemoteException

      • stopRecording

        void stopRecording(int callId)
            throws android.os.RemoteException
        Stop recording of a call.
        参数:
        callId - the call id to stop recording (of all recording ways)
        抛出:
        android.os.RemoteException

      • isRecording

        boolean isRecording(int callId)
             throws android.os.RemoteException
        Is the call being recorded (for at least one way) ?
        参数:
        callId - the call id to get recording status of.
        返回:
        true if the call is currently being recorded
        抛出:
        android.os.RemoteException

      • canRecord

        boolean canRecord(int callId)
           throws android.os.RemoteException
        Can the call be recorded ?
        参数:
        callId - the call id to get record capability of.
        返回:
        true if it's possible to record the call.
        抛出:
        android.os.RemoteException

      • playWaveFile

        void playWaveFile(java.lang.String filePath,
                  int callId,
                  int way)
           throws android.os.RemoteException
        参数:
        filePath - filePath the file to play in stream
        callId - the call to play to
        way - the way the file should be played SipManager.BITMASK_IN => send to user (speaker/earpiece) SipManager.BITMASK_OUT => send to remote party (micro), example : way = 3 : will play sound both ways
        抛出:
        android.os.RemoteException
